here we see Srinivas Acharya and his line. Ramachandra Kaviraj, this is the same person
we were talking about this morning. The Potwala and the Panwala. The great friends of Narottam
Das Thapur. So, we have the deities of Gauranga Mahaprabhu, two Gauranga Mahaprabhus. One
is Gaur Gopal and the other one is Gaur Govinda. So, these are the two deities worshipped by
these two brothers. You also have small Gopal deities gifted by Janava Devi. So, these three
personalities did take lot of guidance and association.
Janava Devi after the departure of Nithyananda Prabhu. So, these are all Nithyananda Vamsas,
our direct connection. Nithyananda Prabhu, Janava Devi and then Srinivas Acharya, Shamananda

So, this is the main flow.
